definition.featurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="feature_container" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_geode_simple"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"/><field name="size">1</field><field name="cannot_replace_tag">features_cannot_replace</field><field name="invalid_blocks_count">1</field><field name="invalid_blocks_tag">geode_invalid_blocks</field><value name="filling"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.AIR</field></block></value><value name="inner_layer"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.DEEPSLATE_EMERALD_ORE</field></block></value><value name="alternate_inner_layer"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.EMERALD_ORE</field></block></value><value name="middle_layer"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GraphiteBlock</field></block></value><value name="outer_layer"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Shungite</field></block></value><value name="crystal0"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.SCULK</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_rarity"><field name="rarity">96</field><comment h="129" pinned="false" w="182">Placement modifiers are processed from top to bottom. If this condition isn't passed, the feature won't be placed</comment><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="189">We then move the geode horizontally, so that it doesn't generate in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_height_uniform"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">We then change the height to a random value between 6 blocks above the bottom of the world and Y=30</comment><value name="min"><block type="vertical_anchor_above_bottom"><field name="value">6</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">30</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment h="85" pinned="false" w="210">Finally, we check that the feature isn't outside of the biome. This placement modifier should always be the last one.</comment></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
